content: I noticed that "answers()" from http://www.healthintersections.com.au/?p=2835 is not on the FHIR FHIRPath extensions page-- http://hl7.org/fhir/2018Sep/fhirpath.html. Is something that will just wait until the next ballot? As a I recall answers() was shortcut for something that looked complicated. What was that alternative complicated FHIRPath expression?
yes it missed the boat. So it will be formalised in R5 I guess
